name: Purchase Receipt Register
query:
SELECT 
    p.name 'Receipt No',
    p.posting_date 'Date',
    p.supplier_delivery_note 'Supplier Delivery Note',
    p.supplier 'Supplier Name',
    i.purchase_order 'Purchase Order',
    i.item_code 'Item Code', 
    i.item_name 'Item Name',
    i.item_group 'Item Group',
    i.received_qty 'Received Quantity', 
    i.uom 'UOM', i.qty 'Accepted Quantity', 
    i.rejected_qty 'Rejected Quantity',
    i.total_weight 'Weight', 
    i.rate 'Rate (INR)', 
    i.amount 'Amount(INR)',
    p.vehicle_no 'Vehicle No',
    p.company 'Company'
FROM
    `tabPurchase Receipt` p
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item` i ON p.name = i.parent
WHERE
    p.docstatus = '1'
    AND p.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND p.company = %(company)s
    AND i.item_group = %(item_group)s
GROUP BY
    p.name,
    p.posting_date, 
    p.company, 
    p.supplier_delivery_note,
    i.purchase_order, 
    i.item_code, 
    i.item_name, 
    i.received_qty, 
    i.uom,
    i.qty, 
    i.rejected_qty,
    i.total_weight, 
    i.rate, 
    i.amount,
    p.vehicle_no
